Class MinecraftGUI

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.minecraft.client.gui.DrawableHelper
      • net.minecraft.client.gui.AbstractParentElement
        • net.minecraft.client.gui.screen.Screen
          • com.lukflug.panelstudio.mc16.MinecraftGUI
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    net.minecraft.client.gui.Drawable, net.minecraft.client.gui.Element, net.minecraft.client.gui.ParentElement, net.minecraft.client.gui.screen.TickableElement
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    MinecraftHUDGUI

    public abstract class MinecraftGUI
extends net.minecraft.client.gui.screen.Screen
    Implementation of Minecraft's GuiScreen that renders a PanelStudio GUI.
